eventDecorators.name: UserRequestForSignature
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: AffirmationCompleted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: SignedForUserRequest
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: SignedForAffirmation
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: CollectedSignatures
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: GasPriceChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: RequiredBlockConfirmationChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

functionDecorators.name: transactionHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns an id of the currently processed message. NOTE: transactionHash was used previously to identify incoming message before AMB message id was introduced. It is kept for backwards compatibility with old mediators contracts, although it doesn't return txHash anymore.

functionDecorators.name: sourceChainId
functionDecorators.description: Internal function for retrieving chain id for the source network.

functionDecorators.name: _sendMessage
functionDecorators.description: Initiates sending of an AMB message to the opposite network.

parameterDecorators.name: _contract
parameterDecorators.description: executor address on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: calldata passed to the executor on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _gas
parameterDecorators.description: gas limit used on the other network for executing a message.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataType
parameterDecorators.description: AMB message dataType to be included as a part of the header.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes AMB contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceChainId
parameterDecorators.description: chain id of a network where this contract is deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: _destinationChainId
parameterDecorators.description: chain id of a network where all outgoing messages are directed.

parameterDecorators.name: _validatorContract
parameterDecorators.description: address of the validators contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxGasPerTx
parameterDecorators.description: maximum amount of gas per one message execution.

parameterDecorators.name: _gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: default gas price used by oracles for sending transactions in this network.

parameterDecorators.name: _requiredBlockConfirmations
parameterDecorators.description: number of block confirmations oracle will wait before processing passed messages.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: address of new bridge owner.

functionDecorators.name: getMinimumGasUsage
functionDecorators.description: Returns a lower limit on gas limit for the particular message data.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: calldata passed to the executor on the other side.

functionDecorators.name: failedMessageReceiver
functionDecorators.description: Returns a receiver address of the failed message that came from the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message from the other side that triggered a call.

functionDecorators.name: setChainIds
functionDecorators.description: Updates chain ids of used networks.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceChainId
parameterDecorators.description: chain id for current network.

parameterDecorators.name: _destinationChainId
parameterDecorators.description: chain id for opposite network.

functionDecorators.name: failedMessageSender
functionDecorators.description: Returns a sender address of the failed message that came from the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message from the other side that triggered a call.

functionDecorators.name: messageId
functionDecorators.description: Returns an id of the currently processed message.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: requireToConfirmMessage
functionDecorators.description: Requests message relay to the opposite network, message is sent to the manual lane.

parameterDecorators.name: _contract
parameterDecorators.description: executor address on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: calldata passed to the executor on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _gas
parameterDecorators.description: gas limit used on the other network for executing a message.

functionDecorators.name: getBridgeInterfacesVersion
functionDecorators.description: Returns currently used bridge version.

functionDecorators.name: messageSourceChainId
functionDecorators.description: Returns an originating chain id of the currently processed message.

functionDecorators.name: destinationChainId
functionDecorators.description: Internal function for retrieving chain id for the destination network.

functionDecorators.name: setGasPrice
functionDecorators.description: Public setter for fallback gas price value. Only bridge owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: new value for the gas price.

functionDecorators.name: messageCallStatus
functionDecorators.description: Returns a status of the message that came from the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message from the other side that triggered a call.

functionDecorators.name: messageSender
functionDecorators.description: Returns an address of the sender on the other side for the currently processed message. Can be used by executors for getting other side caller address.

functionDecorators.name: decimalShift
functionDecorators.description: Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.

functionDecorators.name: requireToPassMessage
functionDecorators.description: Requests message relay to the opposite network.

parameterDecorators.name: _contract
parameterDecorators.description: executor address on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: calldata passed to the executor on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _gas
parameterDecorators.description: gas limit used on the other network for executing a message.

functionDecorators.name: failedMessageDataHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns a data hash of the failed message that came from the other side. NOTE: dataHash was used previously to identify outgoing message before AMB message id was introduced. It is kept for backwards compatibility with old mediators contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message from the other side that triggered a call.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: the address to transfer ownership to.
